title: Systematic Training for Effective Parenting
description: One of the country's most popular parenting guides. Helps parents meet the challenges of raising a family today. THE PARENT'S HANDBOOK shows parents how they can become more knowledgeable, confident and successful in relating to their children. Discusses misbehavior, communication, encouragement, natural and logical consequences, family meetings, drug and alcohol abuse prevention. This book is part of the STEP (Systematic Training for Effective Parenting) series, the world's best selling parent education program.
author: Don C. Dinkmeyer Sr.
